title: beyond graphic design
content:
Hello,

I’d like to know the name of the Font-Family used for the  
„Klasse Fons Hickmann“-book [„beyond graphic design“](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020445/http:/www.klassehickmann.com/beyond_graphic_design.html).  
Maybe somebody can help me,

cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [allesamt2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020445/http:/typophile.com/files/allesamt2.jpg) | 26.8 KB |
| [allesamt7.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020445/http:/typophile.com/files/allesamt7.jpg) | 35.78 KB |
author: Tobias Zotter

comments.content: bump... this is a good one
Wish I knew. This is a very interesting one.
Wow, interesting. I’d like to know too.
Is this one of the highway fonts, eg. Clearview/Transport/Roadgeek?
the credits in the book say it’s “Diseased Pen” by Erwin Bauer, erwinbauer.com - it’s not on his website though.

It’s in one of his designs:  
\> Corporate Design \> Weinquartier

Very cool guys for you to find this one. Its probably non-exclusive too.

Mikey :-)
well the book was sitting on my table when i stumbled over this thread ;)
Is there any info about this font? I’d love to know more about it. I’d also appreciate info about it’s availability.
I emailed but never heard back
